hero.headline: Unblock your mind and supercharge your
hero.tagline: An agentic, AI‑powered workspace editor that anticipates context and orchestrates your workflows, easing even the most complex research and learning tasks.

header.careersDesc: Join us and build the future of education
header.contactDesc: Get in touch with us and let us know how we can help you
header.productDesc: An agentic, AI-powered workspace editor that anticipates context and orchestrates your workflows, easing even the most complex research and learning tasks.
header.companyDesc: We are a team of engineers dedicated to making education more accessible and effective.
header.companionDesc: An autonomous assistant that drafts, summarizes, and organizes research so you stay focused on insight, not busywork.
header.workspaceDesc: A context‑aware workspace that recognizes topic shifts, resurfaces relevant notes, and links concepts automatically for effortless knowledge flow.
header.calendarDesc: A calendar that automatically organizes your research, assignments, and events, so you never miss a deadline.
header.aboutUsDesc: We are a team of engineers dedicated to making education more accessible and effective.
header.contactUsDesc: We'd love to hear from you.

features.contextAwareDesc: A living notebook that senses topic shifts, resurfaces relevant notes, and links concepts automatically for effortless knowledge flow.
features.realTimeSmartEditingDesc: Type as fast as you think with latency‑free predictive typing and inline AI suggestions.
features.multimodalCaptureDesc: Drop images, equations, or voice notes—LECOLE transcribes and tags everything instantly.
features.knowledgeGraphViewDesc: Visualize relationships between ideas in an interactive, auto‑generated concept map.
features.adaptiveStudyPlansDesc: Get personalized revision schedules based on curriculum milestones and real‑time progress.
features.instantCitationsDesc: One click to auto‑format citations and bibliographies in any major style.
features.crossDeviceSyncDesc: Keep your workspace updated across laptop, tablet, and phone—even when offline.
features.agenticLearningCompanionDesc: An autonomous assistant that drafts, summarizes, and organizes research so you stay focused on insight, not busywork.
features.featuresDescription: Context‑aware workspace, agentic learning companion, and tools designed to simplify every study and research challenges.

fastest.taglinePart1: Obsessed with speed, we built LECOLE Workspace to be the fastest note taking app in the world.
fastest.taglinePart2: It is not only fast, but intuitive, it understands you even before you type.
fastest.prefetching: This technology allow us to 'predict' your future actions and preload the data in the background.
fastest.caching: After the data is loaded, it is saved into your current session to avoid loading it again.
fastest.localFirstApproachDesc: Maximize the power of your device. All operations will be performed on your device, instant and secure.
fastest.goalsWithLeastAmountOfClicks: Myriads of tools with native integrations to help you finish your goals with least amount of clicks.
fastest.excalidrawDesc: Excalidraw is a whiteboard tool that allows you to create beautiful diagrams and sketches.
fastest.mermaidDiagramsDesc: Mermaid is a diagramming and charting tool that allows you to represent your ideas in the most concrete way.
fastest.customFilesDesc: Upload any file to form your own knowledge graph and ask questions about it.

inSync.headline: Secured and in sync
inSync.description: Your notes are always in sync across all your devices via Google Drive, with more cloud storage to come. Your data is secured and never crosses our servers.

smartest.academicNeeds: Build from scratch, from your academic needs
smartest.academicTagline: An intuitive note taking experience that makes writing notes feel like second nature.
smartest.academicDescription: You should spend more time listening to lectures and less time typing notes.
smartest.aiModels: Powered by the best AI models
smartest.aiModelsTagline: Ultilise State of The Art LLMs to bring your note taking experience to a whole new level
smartest.aiModelsDescription: We offer every model you can possibly need. Pick the best one depending on your use case. If there's a new model you'd want to add, let us know and we'll make them available within hours.
smartest.academicallyTunedDesc: Embedded with academic knowledge, standardised tests, research papers and more.
smartest.agenticToolsetDesc: Our models are equipped with dozens of tools (still counting) to help you with your work.
smartest.realTimeInternetDesc: Get verifiable answers to your questions with non-hallucinated responses.
smartest.knowsYourKnowledgeDesc: Get answers from your workspace or refer to files or docs. Use the model's response in one click.
smartest.multiModalDesc: Pictures, audio, or YouTube videos. We support it all. You don't have to type it out. Let the model do the work.
smartest.speedyDesc: Just like out notes, our AI models are fast, like really fast. Try it out for and you will see.
smartest.growsWithYouDesc: AI remembers who you are (securely), and has access to your entire workspace (with your permission), it'll be epic for a personal study buddy.
smartest.everythingElseDesc: It's not just about the features, it's about the experience. We've got you covered.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.headline: Your perfect digital workspace environment
workspace.tagline: A powerful workspace that adapts to your workflow and
workspace.flexibleLayoutDesc: Customize your workspace with multiple panels, tabs, and split views to organize your content exactly how you want it.
workspace.seamlessSyncDesc: Your workspace automatically syncs across all your devices, ensuring you always have access to your latest work.
workspace.realTimeCollaborationDesc: Work together with teammates in real-time, seeing each other's changes instantly as you collaborate on projects.
workspace.collaborationTagline: Collaborate in real-time with powerful tools designed for teamwork
workspace.realTimeEditingDesc: Edit documents simultaneously with your team members, seeing changes as they happen with live cursors and presence indicators.
workspace.versionControlDesc: Track changes with built-in version history, allowing you to review, compare, and restore previous versions of your work.
workspace.cloudIntegrationDesc: Seamlessly connect with popular cloud services to import, export, and share your work across different platforms.
workspace.crossPlatformTagline: Your workspace follows you everywhere, with native apps for all major platforms
workspace.desktopAppsDesc: Powerful native applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux with full system integration and offline capabilities.
workspace.tabletExperienceDesc: Optimized tablet apps with touch and stylus support, perfect for note-taking and drawing on iPad and Android tablets.
workspace.mobileAccessDesc: Stay productive on the go with fully-featured mobile apps that sync instantly with your desktop workspace.

product.productDescription: We are on a mission to make learning accessible to everyone. The very first platform to put the emphasis on the learner's experience.

subscribe.title: Stay updated with the latest news
subscribe.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest updates and news about our product.
subscribe.successMessage: We'll keep you updated with the latest news and product updates.

comingSoonFeatures.calendarDesc: Manage your schedule and tasks with ease.
comingSoonFeatures.communityDesc: Publish your notes and create conversations with your peers.
comingSoonFeatures.workspaceDesc: Standalone app for iOS, Android, MacOS and Windows.
comingSoonFeatures.tabDesc: Autocomplete your notes with AI. Just simple tabbing and let LECOLE do the rest.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.description: A modern, AI-powered workspace that adapts to your workflow and enhances your productivity.

companion.title: Companion
companion.description: Use any AI model you want to help you with your work.

pricing.tagline: Free for all learners with an affordable upgrade to elevate your workspace with AI-powered features.
pricing.callOut: Bringing world-class engineering to the education space. From Vietnam with pride.

oauthHomepage.title: LECOLE - Digital SAT Practice Platform
oauthHomepage.appPurposeDesc: LECOLE is a comprehensive digital learning platform designed to help students prepare for standardized tests, particularly the Digital SAT. Our platform provides personalized practice questions, study materials, and AI-powered learning assistance to help students achieve their academic goals. We combine advanced AI technology with educational expertise to create an effective and engaging learning experience.
oauthHomepage.identity: Accurate representation of the app's identity
oauthHomepage.identityDesc: LECOLE (lecole.tech) is an educational technology platform that generates personalized Digital SAT practice questions and provides comprehensive test preparation materials. Our application serves as a complete learning companion for students preparing for standardized tests and pursuing higher education.
oauthHomepage.userData: What this app will do with user data
oauthHomepage.userDataDesc: LECOLE collects minimal user data necessary for providing personalized educational services: name, email address, and profile picture (if available). This information is used to: (1) Create and maintain user accounts, (2) Personalize learning experiences and track progress, (3) Provide customer support and technical assistance, (4) Protect our platform from unauthorized access and abuse, (5) Send educational updates and progress reports (with user consent). We never sell user data to third parties and comply with educational privacy standards including FERPA and COPPA.
oauthHomepage.enhanceFunc: How this app enhances user functionality
oauthHomepage.enhanceFuncDesc: LECOLE enhances student learning through: (1) AI-powered personalized question generation based on individual learning patterns, (2) Adaptive practice tests that adjust difficulty based on performance, (3) Comprehensive performance analytics and progress tracking, (4) Interactive study materials and explanations, (5) Collaborative learning features for peer interaction, (6) Integration with popular educational tools and platforms. Our platform adapts to each student's learning style and pace to maximize educational effectiveness.
oauthHomepage.appDescText: LECOLE is committed to democratizing access to high-quality test preparation and educational resources. Our platform specifically addresses the needs of students preparing for the Digital SAT and other standardized tests. We serve educational institutions, individual students, and families by providing affordable, effective, and accessible learning tools. Our mission is to help students achieve their academic goals and unlock educational opportunities through technology-enhanced learning.
oauthHomepage.limitedUseDesc: LECOLE's use of information received from Google APIs adheres to the
oauthHomepage.googleAPIPolicy: Google API Services User Data Policy
oauthHomepage.limitedUseDetails: including the Limited Use requirements. We only request basic profile information (name, email, profile picture) necessary for account creation and user identification. We do not request access to any Google services data beyond basic profile information.

privacyPolicy.title: LECOLE Digital SAT Suite Privacy Policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: LECOLE ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our Digital SAT Suite web app ("App"). By using the App, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.content: We may collect the following types of personal information when you create an account or use the App:
personalInfo.paymentInfo: * Payment Information: Payment details when you purchase Services (collected and processed securely by Lemon Squeezy for debit/credit/international payments or via QR code for payments in Vietnam).
personalInfo.userContent: * User Content: Information you submit, post, or display through the App, such as practice test answers or study notes.
personalInfo.usageData: * Usage Data: Information about how you use the App, such as the features you access, the pages you visit, and the time spent on each page.

nonPersonalInfo.title: 2.2 Non-Personal Information
nonPersonalInfo.content: We may also collect non-personal information, such as your device type, browser type, and IP address. This information is collected through cookies and similar technologies.

useInfo.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
useInfo.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
points: * To Provide and Improve Services: To provide, maintain, and improve the App and its features, to personalize your experience, and to analyze usage trends.
* To Communicate with You: To send you administrative information, updates, notifications, and marketing communications if you have opted in to receive them.
* To Process Payments: To process payments for Services through Lemon Squeezy or QR code payments.
* To Protect Our Rights: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others.

shareInfo.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
shareInfo.content: We may share your information with the following parties:
points: * Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate the App, process payments, or provide other services.
* Lemon Squeezy: We share payment information with Lemon Squeezy to process payments securely.
* Legal Compliance: We may share your information if required by law, regulation, or legal process.
* Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets.

choices.title: 5. Your Choices
choices.content: You have the following choices regarding your information:
points: * Account Information: You can update or correct your account information at any time.
* Marketing Communications: You can opt out of receiving marketing communications by following the instructions in those communications.
* Cookies: You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may limit your ability to use certain features of the App.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with Services. We may also retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: The App is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on the App.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@lecole.tech.

termsOfService.title: LECOLE Digital SAT Suite Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the LECOLE web app ("App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the App.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: LECOLE provides digital SAT test preparation materials, including practice tests, study guides, and other educational resources (collectively, the "Services"). The Services are intended for personal, non-commercial use only.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use the App. If you are under 18, you represent that you have your parent or guardian's permission to use the App and agree to these Terms.

userAccounts.title: 4. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To access certain Services, you may need to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify LECOLE immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

userContent.title: 5. User Content
userContent.content: You may have the ability to submit, post, or display content through the App ("User Content"). You retain ownership of your User Content, but you grant LECOLE a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display your User Content in connection with the Services.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The App and its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the property of LECOLE or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use any of the App's content without LECOLE's prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The Services are provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. LECOLE does not warrant that the Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, LECOLE shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the App or the Services.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States and Vietnam. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the United States and Vietnam.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: LECOLE may modify these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the App after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: LECOLE may terminate your access to the App at any time for any reason without notice.

payments.title: 12. Payments and Fees
payments.content:
12.1 Payment Methods: LECOLE accepts payment for Services via the following methods:
* Debit/Credit/International Payments (Outside of Vietnam): Processed securely through Lemon Squeezy. By using Lemon Squeezy, you agree to their terms of service and privacy policy, which can be found on their website.
* QR Code Payments (Vietnam): LECOLE provides a QR code payment option for users in Vietnam.
12.2 Fees: The fees for the Services are as listed on the App. LECOLE reserves the right to change the fees at any time.
12.3 Non-refundable: All payments for Services are final and non-refundable. Please carefully review your purchase before completing the transaction.
12.4 Taxes: You are responsible for any applicable taxes associated with your purchase of Services.

lemonSqueezy.title: 13. Lemon Squeezy
lemonSqueezy.content: By using Lemon Squeezy to make a payment, you agree to be bound by Lemon Squeezy's terms of service and privacy policy. LECOLE is not responsible for any issues arising from your use of Lemon Squeezy.

qrCodePayments.title: 14. QR Code Payments
qrCodePayments.content: By using the QR code payment option, you agree to provide accurate and complete payment information. LECOLE is not responsible for any errors or issues arising from incorrect payment information.

updates.title: 15. Updates and Modifications
updates.content: LECOLE may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms of Service on the App. Your continued use of the App following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

contact.title: 16. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact LECOLE at: contact@lecole.tech.

k12.forStudentsDesc: Manage your notes and study materials with ease.
k12.simplifiedNoteTakingDesc: Focus on understanding lessons while LECOLE helps organise your notes.
k12.conceptConnectionsDesc: See how different subjects and topics connect for deeper understanding.
k12.studyAssistanceDesc: Generate practice questions, summaries, and study guides from your notes.
k12.satIntegrationDesc: Practice the SAT right at your fingertips, with more exams coming soon.

companion.title: Your Intelligent Learning Partner
companion.description: An autonomous assistant that drafts, summarizes, and organizes research so you stay focused on insight, not busywork.
companion.contextAwareDesc: Understands your learning context and provides relevant assistance based on your current study materials.
companion.adaptiveLearningDesc: Adjusts to your learning style and pace, providing personalized guidance and support.
companion.smartSuggestionsDesc: Proactively offers relevant resources and insights to enhance your learning experience.
companion.naturalInteractionDesc: Communicate naturally with your AI companion through text, voice, or multimodal inputs.

researcher.forResearchersDesc: Manage your research papers and notes with ease.
researcher.literatureConnectionsDesc: Discover connections between papers and research you might have missed.
researcher.advancedOrganizationDesc: Organize complex research with intelligent categorization and tagging.
researcher.insightGenerationDesc: Uncover patterns and generate hypotheses based on your collected research.

faq.platformsAnswer: LECOLE runs in any modern web browser and we will soon offer dedicated apps for iOS, Android, MacOS and Window.
faq.privacyQuestion: Is my data secure and private?
faq.privacyAnswer: Yes. LECOLE follows FERPA and GDPR guidelines, encrypts data in transit and at rest, and never sells student information.
faq.agenticQuestion: How is the Agentic Learning Companion different from regular AI chat?
faq.agenticAnswer: It maintains long‑term context from your notes and proactively organizes, drafts, and schedules, acting more like a co‑researcher than a chatbot.
faq.collaborationQuestion: Can I collaborate with classmates or colleagues?
faq.collaborationAnswer: Absolutely. Real‑time co‑editing, inline comments, and shared workspaces let teams create together from anywhere.
faq.freePlanQuestion: Do you offer a free plan?
faq.freePlanAnswer: Yes. Students can start with a generous free tier; premium plans add advanced AI features.

cta.joinThousands: Join thousands of students and researchers accelerating their learning with an AI‑powered workspace.

about.message:
## Founder's story

I started my journey as a modest student in Vietnam. I did not consider myself a genius,
but I was determined to succeed. I worked hard and was able to get into the best
university in Vietnam. During the process, I got access to the most important toolset
for my learning: the internet. I was able to learn any thing I needed in order to embark
on my academic journey, including getting a perfect score on the SAT and
scholarships. Inspired by this experience, I wanted to share these possibilities with other students.
That's why I founded LECOLE — to provide an affordable and effective toolset helping them reach their own goals.

Along the way, I was lucky to have met two people who are now my great friends.
We started to work on this idea together until we got the first version of LECOLE as a simple
Digital SAT practice platform. Despite its simplicity, this early app quickly
amassed a significant user base, providing us with invaluable feedback. Our mantra is to build
a product that is not just a tool, but a community. We want to create a place where you
can learn, share your knowledge and achieve your goals.

This user-centric approach has earned us recognition from media outlets, including National Television,
and attracted interest from foreign investors. However, for now, my priority is to keep the company lean
and intensely focused on product development. This ensures our growth remains organic and directly guided
by the needs and experiences of our users.

## Our mission

The interface of our apps reflects our core philosophy: exceptional user experience and intuitive ease-of-use are paramount.
We strive to create a product so intuitive that tutorials aren't necessary—something you can use easily, almost intuitively, like your own hand tools.

We originally developed this application for our own use as students and researchers and hoped that it might be useful to others as well.
Fundamentally, our motivation comes from the rigorous standards of Vietnam's competitive examinations and educational system;
we are committed to taking advantage of that quality to enable everyone to learn more easily and effectively.

In the future, we plan on continuing to develop our platform with more features and subjects.
As we grow further, we are committed to making more content free and giving back to the community.
We firmly believe that education is basic and boundless—nothing should come in the way of a motivated learner.

## Our aspiration

Our vision is to build the ultimate destination for students worldwide to learn, share knowledge, and chase their dreams.
We wish to take the torch of Vietnamese educational quality to the global stage and combine it with the power of advanced AI to design a truly effective and enjoyable experience of learning.

With that in mind, we know the company is in its early stages.
We are a small team now, still figuring out how to make a truly incredible product.
There will be errors along the way, but here is our promise to you: we will always listen to your feedback and strive to improve our site at record-breaking speed.

Lastly, our team at LECOLE, we pride ourselves at the latest pivot of the company as it reflects our passion for innovation and change. We want to share the message of a world-class product, originating from the S-shaped country and to express our following the ethos of Vietnamese government in the Aspirational Era.

I truly believe that our adventure is just beginning, and I'm excited about the future we can build together. Thanks for traveling with us so far.
